paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses various studies on TTR gene variants related to ATTRv amyloidosis, focusing on the effectiveness of Patisiran and Vutrisiran treatments.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The recruitment process entailed including 32 patients for ALN-TTR01 and 17 patients for ALN-TTR02, with 56% being male in the former group.

variants.additional_notes: The study highlights the importance of early identification and treatment.
key_quotes: Over 130 pathogenic mutations have been delineated, with the most common TTR variants being the valine-to-methionine substitution at amino acid 30 mutation (Val30Met).

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the paper provided clear information on the TTR variant.
